name: Recipe: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake.

value.name: Crab Roe
value.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

value.name: Ham
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Cream
value.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

value.name: Cabbage
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
value.desc: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!

value.name: Sucrose
value.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

value.name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
value.desc: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from completing the Daily Commission "Food Delivery"</color>
